definition: Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 哈努卡節|哈努卡节 and simply 哈努卡
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Jewish people celebrate the holiday of Hanukkah.
Chandler: Well, I'll stay, but only because I wanna hear about Hanukkah .
sentences.chinese: 好，我留下，不過我想聽光明節的故事。

sentences.english: It was the first night of Chanukah and the night before Ellie's last final.
sentences.chinese: 那是光明節的第一個晚上，也是艾莉期末考試的前夜。

sentences.english: Hi, Jim. Do you know about Hanukkah ?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，吉姆。你知道光明節嗎？

sentences.english: "Joy to The World" includes songs for Christmas and Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: “歡樂世界”包括聖誕節和光明節的歌。

sentences.english: And that my friends, is the true meaning of Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: 而我的朋友們，那就是光明節的真正意涵。

sentences.english: My niece gets a small gift each night of Hanukkah and of course spins the dreidel.
sentences.chinese: 我侄女在光明節的每個晚上都能得到禮物。

sentences.english: Can you tell me something about Hanukkah?
Hanukkah is an eight-day Jewish holiday in December.
sentences.chinese: 光明節是一個爲時八天的猶太教節日。

sentences.english: Part of the tradition of Hanukkah is eating a lot of fried food.
sentences.chinese: 光明節的一個傳統就是喫很多油炸的食品。

sentences.english: We wish you many blessings this Christmas or Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望你能更多地祝福此聖誕節或光明節。

sentences.english: By Eileen GoltzIt was the first night of Chanukah and the night before Ellie's last final.
sentences.chinese: 那是光明節的第一個晚上，也是艾莉期末考試的前夜。

sentences.english: Menorah, a special candleholder, is a symbol associated with the celebration of Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: 七分枝聖燭臺是光明節慶典的一個標誌。
